rows.label: tlk70000119_10_msg0001
rows.name:
I finally heard from Rita-chan
and Kaede-san. You've been
helping them out loads, huh?

rows.label: tlk70000119_10_msg0002
rows.name:
So have I! I think they've been
listening to my advice, too...

rows.label: tlk70000119_10_msg0003
rows.name:
But they seem to have a deeper
bond with you. Do you think we
could chat sometimes, too?

rows.label: tlk70000119_10_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, yeah! I haven't
introduced myself, have I?

rows.label: tlk70000119_10_msg0005
rows.name:
The name's Mines. I wanna be a
teacher some day. Nice to meet you!
